wikipedia_page.main: Ernest Henry Bambridge (16 May 1848 – 16 October 1917) was an English footballer who made one appearance as a forward for England in 1876. He was the eldest of three brothers who played for England.

response: * 16 May – Ernest Bambridge (d. 1917), England international in 1876 and one of three brothers who all played for England.

link_mentions.page: List of English association football families
response: * Arthur Bambridge, Charles Bambridge (brother), Ernest Bambridge (brother)The only trio of brothers to have played for England.
